content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: green_wool
inventory=[{"type": "prismarine_brick_stairs", "quantity": 27, "index": 10}, {"type": "tube_coral_fan", "quantity": 38, "index": 16}, {"type": "fern", "quantity": 49, "index": 17}, {"type": "green_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "chest", "quantity": 25, "index": 20}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "stone_brick_stairs", "quantity": 55, "index": 24}, {"type": "red_nether_brick_stairs", "quantity": 53, "index": 32}, {"type": "dark_prismarine_slab", "quantity": 16, "index": 36}, {"type": "iron_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft green_wool, I need to place a green_dye next to a white_wool in the crafting table. I will first move the green_dye from slot 19 to slot 1 in the crafting table.
act: move from slot 19 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: green_wool
inventory=[{"type": "green_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "prismarine_brick_stairs", "quantity": 27, "index": 10}, {"type": "tube_coral_fan", "quantity": 38, "index": 16}, {"type": "fern", "quantity": 49, "index": 17}, {"type": "chest", "quantity": 25, "index": 20}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "stone_brick_stairs", "quantity": 55, "index": 24}, {"type": "red_nether_brick_stairs", "quantity": 53, "index": 32}, {"type": "dark_prismarine_slab", "quantity": 16, "index": 36}, {"type": "iron_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]
thought: Now that the green_dye is in the crafting table, I need to move the white_wool next to it. I will move the white_wool from slot 23 to slot 2, which is next to slot 1.
act: move from slot 23 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: green_wool
inventory=[{"type": "green_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "green_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "prismarine_brick_stairs", "quantity": 27, "index": 10}, {"type": "tube_coral_fan", "quantity": 38, "index": 16}, {"type": "fern", "quantity": 49, "index": 17}, {"type": "chest", "quantity": 25, "index": 20}, {"type": "stone_brick_stairs", "quantity": 55, "index": 24}, {"type": "red_nether_brick_stairs", "quantity": 53, "index": 32}, {"type": "dark_prismarine_slab", "quantity": 16, "index": 36}, {"type": "iron_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]
thought: Now that the green_wool has been crafted, I need to move it from the crafting slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
